subject: The Friday Unwind: Your week in one smooth scroll
description_text:
Catch up on what’s happened this week - no stress, just the highlights.

View in browser (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VWRHkz79p2trW6XZx0l2YcMXMW4FBnYy5JmbXLMVmxWq5n4LbW7Y9pgv6lZ3mPN3z5FmdKBxQhW6wSCVk74vJ0kVf3t0k4Yyw2MW32JJnk4cYLpgW1FGw432nZJPfMqHqSJ6RJ5FW3h9h7t3XLBPrW9dm40H3TSdlWVl6lT92pXb1GW3SDtBr4ngtQvW2xjtJm7j4mcDW8n_xty1krgP6W3cyrvq6pW6mqVkC1Rj6tZs8LW4VVxrF9cpkHqW7dMJqX8CWpgsV2rFFP41p728W3JF-Q02T2QgWN4yc-xKX-1fzW6ZmWTg8wHk60MpZgm_s01MHW67StY-8Clf3sW34X_D5222lfCW1wtd8539-ttbW92gVpB798WGTW27wyLs70mtFyW7WzYrz5jc08VVWlF5B49Fv8SVH9HZS7Q7fl_W17z8268tzNnrVp6f3X3qLfQZW5TKtf_6gFWnhW17nlB_3Xsl1sW1ns3sQ6NMyvtW5J5nGc4Q0f3rW8tR61T4p7-jBW4kbnhd8Tm15sW2lpsYs2n1QthW2WYBkN3Bb51nW4WkWxr2nkJbkW4zLxP63Rg9XzW8jXN-J7z_50yf5GCS1K04 )



Hey Atto,

As the year starts to take shape, here’s your weekly roundup to inspire smarter decisions, bolder experimentation, and sustained growth.

This week’s content explores what it takes to build high-performing commerce organisations: disciplined experimentation that drives real uplift, retail-proven thinking applied to DTC, data mastery in an omnichannel world, and a case study showing how Oliver Bonas turns discovery into lasting impact.

Catch you next week,

– The Athos Commerce Team





Featured This Week

? Ebook | Experiments Playbook (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VWRHkz79p2trW6XZx0l2YcMXMW4FBnYy5JmbXLMVmxTY5n4LbW50kH_H6lZ3kHW2YPdZR1rMRMxW4P6K1p42qL2VW7LQ-sV1FDbC0W87Qy0r5hKqzKW9hTrBQ7pwqpKW2rN3Vv2hjYCgVVX0RJ5rQJtqW4d1l9k4gxBW0W3jCnrd8RLxsJW3P51lY1f_JVrW3z4_H748YLVsW2trxmL4DRsMkMBhsTw7MGn3W6XRvtf1TtR-ZV215xN8ZsG6nN7wv7cPVkgc9W4wQQ_y3Rk_y2W95DHKt5gxtDgW7PzsPm5m0rF1W6Z4B4_19KRlpVpPr7T4dvK0cW3ZYYxs825-sDW7RMmhs7FpxpdW1TjM-J8NR2ZnW1fMlSY3Y4sRlW3R5H228gB579W5Zj_bW86tCkDW5NtJz53GqtZhW5S8D2T9jWQ8-W711zpz8wDZwCW1dTTcc4PXdzRW2XcFv-9b6H2Ff4Z09fg04 )

A definitive testing guide to double advertising performance using rigorous experimentation, advanced A/B methods, and data-driven optimisation scale





Podcast | Episode 1: What Retail Teaches You About Running a DTC Brand (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VWRHkz79p2trW6XZx0l2YcMXMW4FBnYy5JmbXLMVmxWq3pyd0W7Y8-PT6lZ3mHW9dtN_98Tlz-6W8-2hNZ1bWRqnW4xfqRH55pVpzVywMZH7GGS36W9dCzC25XG5gdW63V4n_8Zt1ZBW6cBmn247WVfMW6xyd7z1K64GsW8Bxm623w-DWsW60TDn98X3mTTN3KVDhlY711XV4VvdJ6XLWgwV335fC6W5mv5W19yGt66pz4xXVlN31c2BPzxYW3jFdX41l6SCQW6jqkYN1JxDVFW1V8-nB92K8vPW2Fy3l47xFpt9W6n3D153v7SxjW3ysfD35KLMPbW58TksS90345kW8s3jM43fXRHKW7dSLTc8Zh8XLW3bZNyr7hvrg2W8Xn68Z5Qw9BpdmRGrP04 )

Athos Commerce talks to Howard Sobel, former COO and Systems Integrator at Fifty Flowers. Howard brings a unique perspective from his years working across mass and specialty retail (Walmart, Target, Costco) to the world of Direct-to-Consumer (D2C) e-commerce.

Podcast | Episode 2: The Real Rise of Social Commerce (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VWRHkz79p2trW6XZx0l2YcMXMW4FBnYy5JmbXLMVmxWq3pyd0W7Y8-PT6lZ3mHW9dtN_98Tlz-6W8-2hNZ1bWRqnW4xfqRH55pVpzVywMZH7GGS36W9dCzC25XG5gdW63V4n_8Zt1ZBW6cBmn247WVfMW6xyd7z1K64GsW8Bxm623w-DWsW60TDn98X3mTTN3KVDhlY711XV4VvdJ6XLWgwV335fC6W5mv5W19yGt66pz4xXVlN31c2BPzxYW3jFdX41l6SCQW6jqkYN1JxDVFW1V8-nB92K8vPW2Fy3l47xFpt9W6n3D153v7SxjW3ysfD35KLMPbW58TksS90345kW8s3jM43fXRHKW7dSLTc8Zh8XLW3bZNyr7hvrg2W8Xn68Z5Qw9BpdmRGrP04 )

Join Andra Muntean, as she talks to Dave Morrissey, a growth and culture consultant and author of Grow Like a Tech Company. Dave brings a sharp perspective from his years working across major platforms like Facebook and TikTok, where he led retail and ecommerce partnerships.

Blog | How to Master Your Data and Outpace the Omnichannel Shift (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VWRHkz79p2trW6XZx0l2YcMXMW4FBnYy5JmbXLMVmxTY5n4LbW50kH_H6lZ3k_W46HkJT2GjRMQW4_HgQV70RpW6W8Zt6hM97grfzW7-Y3BZ8gszyHW3mkGnt6f0byfW90c5Hp1kPCV3VJHjvV4CsDvVN7V74BKlkVLkW64LQst6N0p8JN82V6Wv2S6_qW5B1jZ790Z-G_W3DG_hg57LxzGW1KhlhQ3hydMqW16NvLM9lBVt0W605l_36Pk5K_W75PBSj2jKY_rW71PY298SjNw1W5KzmWL4MF7H6W2Vw09V1jMW-GW1qs4VZ7gcxtkW3JTSCJ7wslq6N3934Cgp4TYtW77BZZm3hc4GPW7djnQN84P50rW5XKHn27TzNwZW3tT8663M8SJmW6tgTVg1JlYZVW8XxJjW941rCqW2GtDRB8GWWmSW51RtHM7GwVm8W6Bl-Fx4R7r4pW1QKF9j8VhkXZf3VcNTW04 )

Master modern omnichannel commerce with precise product data, AI-ready visibility, and high-performance experiences that drive consistent conversions today.

Case Study | Oliver Bonas (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VWRHkz79p2trW6XZx0l2YcMXMW4FBnYy5JmbXLMVmxWK3pyd0W8wLKSR6lZ3n-N5GB3dM_b6NSN2MLc_GG1SfhW3pQxdn133lZpW1vfyFZ4g1LGrW1g0C596SqjFmW72NkWF48kHkfW4bDqvz1gTXymW4vJrjs3QgRyTVfnZHx7-06TdW6Mqzmv4gYRmTW5B1_TH25NH39W30dW7h3sFSZdW86jykt6jm0srW4y54MP8dYPt9W7_yR5X6yp9rWW8f9P8v3X684XN74X8s1mD1d3W29dyBj1t4R4TW2L-ynD8-8YHxN7qpLgpf7BB7VtxJZs3993nvW8f6qV25M2KSsW4kynlY71_HqWW2bQK10292Wn1W2K9LX284mPvrW44cy9Z72y1jcW5-g8m96qGqC_W70NvwF9lgXzjf8wsr5604 )

Oliver Bonas transforms online shopping with Athos Commerce - smarter search, effortless merchandising, and powerful results that turn browsers into buyers.
